scripts.build:darwin-arm64: npm run build -- -target aarch64-macos && mv libuv-monitor.node npm/darwin-arm64/libuv-monitor.darwin-arm64.node
scripts.build:darwin-x64: npm run build -- -target x86_64-macos && mv libuv-monitor.node npm/darwin-x64/libuv-monitor.darwin-x64.node
scripts.build:linux-arm64: npm run build -- -target aarch64-linux && mv libuv-monitor.node npm/linux-arm64/libuv-monitor.linux-arm64.node
scripts.build:linux-x64: npm run build -- -target x86_64-linux && mv libuv-monitor.node npm/linux-x64/libuv-monitor.linux-x64.node
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:ci
